website_summaries.verdict: The Wallflower would be a useful tool if you have to monitor a loved one's stove use. But it would be a better product if it shut down the stove instead of just sending you alerts.
pros: The $170 Wallflower smart plug is easy to install: Insert it into your wall outlet and plug your electric stove into the Wallflower
You can use the Wallflower's app to check if your stove's status, and it will send you an alert if it detects that you're away from home while the stove is still on
cons: The Wallflower can't turn the stove off, so you'd still have to go back home if you left it on

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it would. I wish it ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this because my aging father keeps leaving the stove on after cooking and sometimes forgets about it altogether. Does what it says it would. I wish it was flatter, wasn't able to push the stove back all the way. Been looking for an extension cord that would fit nicely underneath instead. Also the app needs a kill switch that you can activate remotely.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Chamalage

customer_reviews.title: Gives peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Love this device. Let's me know when my mother turns her stove on and off and gives me some peace of mind. Had an issue with the notifications (not getting them). I emailed the company and they responded immediately on a weekend! Went through several steps and finally got the notifications working again. Great customer service. I do see some reviewers want a device that would turn the stove off but they were too complicated for my mom to reset. This wonderful gadget let's me know if the stove has been on longer than usual and I can call and tell her to check.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Right Fit for Us - Price is Right
customer_reviews.text: Although this model does not have a shut off function, it was the best fit for our mom. She is young, but can be forgetful because of a brain hemorrhage three years ago. She likes to cook, but we were uncomfortable with her cooking alone - and SHE was uncomfortable cooking alone. Wallflower allows her independence in meal prep and has made her more confident. The app alert system works well for her because she is never without her iPhone. LOL Other products specifically designed for stoves cost upwards of 400-500. This was exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: The functionality is not what is perceived to be, the only function is to tell you that the stove is on. I was unable to setup the unit with my Samsung S10 had to use some ones iPhone to setup. There is no way to turn off /regulate the stove/oven its on.
customer_reviews.author: crosdale

customer_reviews.title: Great for peace of mind with older parent
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Wallflower for my mom, and installed it in her house. It was very easy to do. She lives alone and is getting up there in age, so it is great to have some peace of mind that she won't accidentally leave the stove on. Though, now I'm thinking that maybe I should get one for myself as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Works well now
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this right after an iOS update. We didn’t know it, but the update killed the phone app. It was very frustrating trying to get it set up. I emailed the company and they responded the same day telling me a new updated app was on the way. Once the app was updated, it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Jim and Dee Ann Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great idea though
customer_reviews.text: Too fat to fit in the space available. I had to remove it and now if I want to use it I will have to buy an expensive extension cord. This design seems obviously flawed, it should have been made as an extension cord rather than a wall plug/socket combo. Great idea though, I just hope I manage to get it installed.
customer_reviews.author: ??_RO7??

customer_reviews.title: We need to turn it off remotely
customer_reviews.text: If this product you can control to turn off your stove it will be nice Try to make it smart more than this
customer_reviews.author: AL HARBI KHALID JAZA

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 93 year old MIL stove. The best purchase I’ve made this year. EASY installation and great piece of mind. Let’s me know when she turns the stove on and when she turns it off. Even has a timer that if the stove is on for a certain amount of time it alerts on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Baker

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get it to work
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get it to work though following the directions. Possibly my fault since its ratings seem to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Mulberry

customer_reviews.title: Only notify and lack ability to turn ON or OFF
customer_reviews.text: Device ONLY send notification when stove is On or Off. Lacks ability to turn ON or OFF remotely - not sure why smart 112VAC outlet have this feature to turn On or Off but not for smart 240VAC outlet like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Son B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and setup. Works as stated. Note you need to make sure you have a good wifi single near the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V. Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Solves a worry for many people
customer_reviews.text: Last stove in vacation house was turned on somehow for a week before I found the place overheated and the entire oven glowing a dangerous red. Would have burned the place down by the next day. Scary? Fixed!
customer_reviews.author: Chester

customer_reviews.title: Plug and Play Safety!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a gadget hound... I had to have this! Plug and play is an understatement, it just _worked_. I had it installed for a couple of weeks, and kinda' forgot about it... And then, I left the house for a Costco run. I hit the end of the driveway and BEEP! The app brings itself front and center, and, as advertised, "Did you forget to turn off the stove"? Huh... Actually, I didn't forget (there was a roast in the oven) but it did make me think twice about leaving the house with the stove on! And, I delayed my trip to Costco by an hour, so that I could turn the stove off. :) Neat device!
customer_reviews.author: MIDIWall

customer_reviews.title: Solid design, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I just got this product for our house and I'm truly impressed by it. There's lots of gadgets out there right now that provide too many alerts and too much unneeded information. I found this to have just the right amount of alerts without being annoying, and It's already been helpful. Last weekend we had company over- kids running around, adults socializing and cooking happening. We have an electric stove, so it is easy to forget that its working especially when one is distracted. Because of this gadget, the casserole was saved, everyone was fed and I am now confident that this is a device I could trust.
customer_reviews.author: Misha Ivanov

customer_reviews.title: It is incredibly easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I am often away during the weekends and my teenage children constantly use the stove. It is an incredible piece of mind. I too on occasion have had to be reminded that I left the stove on. It is incredibly easy to install, setup on your smart phone and use. I fully recommend this product and also purchased one for my elderly parents as well for the same reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, solid execution.
customer_reviews.text: A must-have device for a modern-day smart home that provides a piece of mind whether you are at home or away. We've been using this device for several months now and we love the simplicity of use and timely notifications it provides. Wherever you are - at home or not - you can know whether your stove has been turned on/off, or has been on for longer than usual (maybe because someone at your home was cooking, but then forgot to turn off the burner - and this happens much more often than we realized before!). Wallflower is next best thing to being at home right by your stove.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Share

customer_reviews.title: Great for busy parents!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this product for a little while now and it works fantastic. We never have those "did we leave the stove on" moments anymore, which is great peace of mind when you're always on the go. Install was as simple as it gets, pretty much plug and play. With busy lives it's things like this that make life easier. We are glad that we got it and would highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: maryam maurer
